mapper.select: SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, AVG_RATING as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as resImage, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_ID = #{resId}

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, AVG_RATING as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as resImage, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT ORDER BY resId DESC

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, AVG_RATING as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as resImage, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT WHERE lower(resName) like %#{keywords}%
